00027 EGEnergyCorrector_fra::EGEnergyCorrector_fra() :
00028   fReadereb(0),
00029   fReaderebvariance(0),
00030   fReaderee(0),
00031   fReadereevariance(0),
00032   fIsInitialized(kFALSE),
00033   fOwnsForests(kFALSE),
00034   fVals(0),
00035   _GetCorrections(true)
00036 {
00037   // Constructor.
00038 }
00039 
00040 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 EGEnergyCorrector_fra::~EGEnergyCorrector_fra()
00042 {
00043 
00044   if (fVals) delete [] fVals;
00045 
00046   if (fOwnsForests) {
00047     if (fReadereb) delete fReadereb;
00048     if (fReaderebvariance) delete fReaderebvariance;  
00049     if (fReaderee) delete fReaderee;
00050     if (fReadereevariance) delete fReadereevariance;
00051   }
00052 
00053 }

00055 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 void EGEnergyCorrector_fra::Initialize(const edm::EventSetup &iSetup, std::string regweights, bool weightsFromDB, bool ptSplit) {
00057   fIsInitialized = kTRUE;
00058 
00059   if (fVals) delete [] fVals;
00060   if (fOwnsForests) {
00061     if (fReadereb) delete fReadereb;
00062     //      if (fReaderebvariance) delete fReaderebvariance;  
00063     if (fReaderee) delete fReaderee;
00064     //      if (fReadereevariance) delete fReadereevariance;    
00065   }    
00066 
00067   fVals = new Float_t[73];
00068 
00069   if (weightsFromDB) { //weights from event setup
00070 #ifndef CMSSW42X
00071     edm::ESHandle<GBRForest> readereb;
00072     edm::ESHandle<GBRForest> readerebvar;
00073     edm::ESHandle<GBRForest> readeree;
00074     edm::ESHandle<GBRForest> readereevar;
00075 #else
00076     edm::ESHandle<GBRWrapper> readereb;
00077     edm::ESHandle<GBRWrapper> readerebvar;
00078     edm::ESHandle<GBRWrapper> readeree;
00079     edm::ESHandle<GBRWrapper> readereevar;
00080 #endif
00081     iSetup.get<GBRWrapperRcd>().get(std::string(TString::Format("%s_EBCorrection",regweights.c_str())),readereb);
00082     iSetup.get<GBRWrapperRcd>().get(std::string(TString::Format("%s_EBUncertainty",regweights.c_str())),readerebvar);
00083     iSetup.get<GBRWrapperRcd>().get(std::string(TString::Format("%s_EECorrection",regweights.c_str())),readeree);
00084     iSetup.get<GBRWrapperRcd>().get(std::string(TString::Format("%s_EEUncertainty",regweights.c_str())),readereevar);
00085 
00086 #ifndef CMSSW42X
00087     fReadereb         = readereb.product();
00088     fReaderebvariance = readerebvar.product();
00089     fReaderee         = readeree.product();
00090     fReadereevariance = readereevar.product();
00091 #else
00092     fReadereb         = &readereb->GetForest();
00093     fReaderebvariance = &readerebvar->GetForest();
00094     fReaderee         = &readeree->GetForest();
00095     fReadereevariance = &readereevar->GetForest();
00096 #endif
00097   } else {                      //weights from root file
00098     if((TString(regweights)).Contains("noweight",TString::kIgnoreCase) || (TString(regweights)).Contains("nocorrection",TString::kIgnoreCase)){
00099       std::cout << "[WARNING] Fra corrections not used" << std::endl;
00100       _GetCorrections=false;
00101     }else{
00102 
00103       fOwnsForests = kTRUE;
00104       TFile *fgbr = TFile::Open(regweights.c_str(),"READ");
00105       if(!fgbr->IsOpen() || fgbr->IsZombie()){
00106         edm::LogError("EGEnergyCorrector_fra") << "Reading file " << regweights << " error: file not opended";
00107         exit(1);
00108       }
00109 
00110       if(ptSplit== false){
00111         fReadereb = (GBRForest*)fgbr->Get("EBCorrection");
00112         fReaderebvariance = (GBRForest*)fgbr->Get("EBUncertainty");  
00113         fReaderee = (GBRForest*)fgbr->Get("EECorrection");
00114         fReadereevariance = (GBRForest*)fgbr->Get("EEUncertainty");      
00115       }else{
00116         std::cout<<"reading forest"<<std::endl;
00117         fReadereb_lowPt = (GBRForest*)fgbr->Get("EBCorrection_lowPt");
00118         fReaderee_lowPt = (GBRForest*)fgbr->Get("EECorrection_lowPt");
00119          
00120         fReadereb_highPt = (GBRForest*)fgbr->Get("EBCorrection_highPt");
00121         fReaderee_highPt = (GBRForest*)fgbr->Get("EECorrection_highPt");
00122 
00123         if(fReadereb_lowPt==NULL)std::cout<<"ebcorr not found"<<std::endl;
00124       }
00125 
00126 
00127       varnameseb=(vector<string> *)fgbr->Get("varlisteb");
00128       varnamesee=(vector<string> *)fgbr->Get("varlistee");
00129       //      vector<int*>::iterator g;
00130        
00131       if(varnameseb==NULL)std::cout<<" var name file not found";
00132       fgbr->Close();
00133     
00134     }
00135   }
00136   
00137 }

00139 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00140 
00141 std::pair<double,double> EGEnergyCorrector_fra::CorrectedEnergyWithErrorTracker(const GsfElectron &e, const reco::VertexCollection& vtxcol, double rho, EcalClusterLazyTools &clustertools, const edm::EventSetup &es, bool ptSplit) {
00142   if(!_GetCorrections) return std::make_pair<double,double>(0,0);
00143 
00144   const SuperClusterRef s = e.superCluster();
00145   const CaloClusterPtr b = s->seed(); //seed  basic cluster
00146 
00147   Bool_t isbarrel = b->hitsAndFractions().at(0).first.subdetId()==EcalBarrel;
00148 
00149   //seed basic cluster variables
00150 
00151   double bemax = clustertools.eMax(*b);
00152   double be2nd = clustertools.e2nd(*b);
00153   double betop = clustertools.eTop(*b);
00154   double bebottom = clustertools.eBottom(*b);
00155   double beleft = clustertools.eLeft(*b);
00156   double beright = clustertools.eRight(*b);
00157 
00158 
00159   double be2x5max = clustertools.e2x5Max(*b);
00160   double be2x5top = clustertools.e2x5Top(*b);
00161   double be2x5bottom = clustertools.e2x5Bottom(*b);
00162   double be2x5left = clustertools.e2x5Left(*b);
00163   double be2x5right = clustertools.e2x5Right(*b);
00164 
00165 
00166 
00167   
00168   //local coordinates and crystal indices (barrel only)    
00169   
00170   //seed cluster
00171   float betacry, bphicry, bthetatilt, bphitilt;
00172   int bieta, biphi;
00173   
00174 
00175   if(isbarrel){
00176     _ecalLocal.localCoordsEB(*b,es,betacry,bphicry,bieta,biphi,bthetatilt,bphitilt);
00177   }
00178 
00179   std::vector<std::string> *varVector;
00180 
00181   if(isbarrel){
00182     varVector=varnameseb;
00183   }else{
00184     varVector=varnamesee;
00185   }
00186     
00187   int j=0;
00188   for(std::vector<std::string>::iterator i=varVector->begin();i<varVector->end();i++) {
00189     fVals[j]=-1000;
00190     if(*i =="SCRawEnergy")fVals[j]=s->rawEnergy();
00191     else if(*i =="scEta")fVals[j]=s->eta();
00192     else if(*i =="scPhi")fVals[j]=s->phi();
00193     else if(*i =="R9")fVals[j]=clustertools.e3x3(*b)/s->rawEnergy(); //r9 
00194     else if(*i =="E5x5Seed/SCRawEnergy")fVals[j]=clustertools.e5x5(*b)/s->rawEnergy();      
00195     else if(*i =="etawidth")fVals[j]=  s->etaWidth();   
00196     else if(*i =="phiwidth")fVals[j]=  s->phiWidth();   
00197     else if(*i =="NClusters")fVals[j]= s->clustersSize();
00198 #ifndef CMSSW42X
00199     else if(*i =="HoE")fVals[j]=          e.hcalOverEcalBc();
00200 #else 
00201     else if(*i =="HoE")fVals[j]=          e.hadronicOverEm();
00202 #endif
00203     else if(*i =="rho")fVals[j]=  rho;          
00204     else if(*i =="vertices")fVals[j]= vtxcol.size();    
00205     else if(*i =="EtaSeed-scEta")fVals[j]=b->eta()-s->eta();
00206     else if(*i =="atan2(sin(PhiSeed-scPhi),cos(PhiSeed-scPhi))")fVals[j]=reco::deltaPhi(b->phi(),s->phi());
00207     else if(*i =="ESeed/SCRawEnergy")fVals[j]=b->energy()/s->rawEnergy();
00208     else if(*i =="E3x3Seed/ESeed")fVals[j]=clustertools.e3x3(*b)/b->energy();
00209     else if(*i =="E5x5Seed/ESeed")fVals[j]=clustertools.e5x5(*b)/b->energy();
00210     else if(*i =="see")fVals[j]= sqrt(clustertools.localCovariances(*b)[0]); //sigietaieta
00211     else if(*i =="spp")fVals[j]=  sqrt(clustertools.localCovariances(*b)[2]); //sigiphiiphi
00212     else if(*i =="sep")fVals[j]=   clustertools.localCovariances(*b)[1];       //sigietaiphi
00213     else if(*i =="EMaxSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=bemax/b->energy();
00214     else if(*i =="E2ndSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=be2nd/b->energy();
00215     else if(*i =="ETopSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=betop/b->energy();
00216     else if(*i =="EBottomSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=bebottom/b->energy();
00217     else if(*i =="ELeftSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=beleft/b->energy();
00218     else if(*i =="ERightSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=beright/b->energy();
00219     else if(*i =="E2x5MaxSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=be2x5max/b->energy();
00220     else if(*i =="E2x5TopSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=be2x5top/b->energy();
00221     else if(*i =="E2x5BottomSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=be2x5bottom/b->energy();
00222     else if(*i =="E2x5LeftSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=be2x5left/b->energy();
00223     else if(*i =="E2x5RightSeed/ESeed")fVals[j]=be2x5right/b->energy();
00224     else if(*i =="pmeangsf/pmodegsf")fVals[j]=e.gsfTrack()->p()/e.gsfTrack()->pMode();
00225     else if(*i =="fbrem")fVals[j]=e.fbrem();
00226     else if(*i =="Charge")fVals[j]=e.charge();
00227     else if(*i =="EoP")fVals[j]=e.eSuperClusterOverP();
00228     else if(*i =="IEtaSeed")fVals[j]=bieta;
00229     else if(*i =="IPhiSeed")fVals[j]=biphi;
00230     else if(*i =="IEtaSeed%5")fVals[j]=bieta%5;
00231     else if(*i =="IPhiSeed%2")fVals[j]=biphi%2;
00232     else if(*i =="(abs(IEtaSeed)<=25)*(IEtaSeed%25) + (abs(IEtaSeed)>25)*((IEtaSeed-25*abs(IEtaSeed)/IEtaSeed)%20)")fVals[j]=(TMath::Abs(bieta)<=25)*(bieta%25) + (TMath::Abs(bieta)>25)*((bieta-25*TMath::Abs(bieta)/bieta)%20);
00233     else if(*i =="IPhiSeed%20")fVals[j]=biphi%20;
00234     else if(*i =="EtaCrySeed")fVals[j]=betacry;
00235     else if(*i =="PhiCrySeed")fVals[j]= bphicry;
00236     else if(*i =="PreShowerOverRaw")fVals[j]=s->preshowerEnergy()/s->rawEnergy();
00237     else if(*i == "gsfchi2")fVals[j]=e.gsfTrack()->normalizedChi2();
00238     else if(*i == "deta")fVals[j]=e.deltaEtaSuperClusterTrackAtVtx();
00239     else if(*i == "dphi")fVals[j]=e.deltaPhiSuperClusterTrackAtVtx();
00240     else if(*i == "pmeangsf/pmeankf")
00241       fVals[j] = (e.closestCtfTrackRef().isNonnull()) ? e.gsfTrack()->p()/e.closestCtfTrackRef()->p() : -1;
00242     else if(*i == "detacalo")fVals[j]=e.deltaEtaSeedClusterTrackAtCalo();
00243     else if(*i == "dphicalo")fVals[j]=e.deltaPhiSeedClusterTrackAtCalo();
00244     else if(*i == "kfhits")
00245       fVals[j] = (e.closestCtfTrackRef().isNonnull()) ? e.closestCtfTrackRef()->found() : fVals[j]=-1;
00246     else if(*i == "pterrorgsf")fVals[j]=e.gsfTrack()->ptModeError();
00247     else if(*i == "pt")fVals[j]=e.pt();
00248 
00249     else if(fVals[j]==-1000){
00250       edm::LogError("EGEnergyCorrector_fra") << "Variable " << *i <<" not found ";
00251       exit(1);
00252     }
00253     j++;
00254   }
00255 
00256 
00257     
00258   Double_t den;
00259   const GBRForest *reader;
00260   const GBRForest *readervar;
00261   if (isbarrel) {
00262     if(!ptSplit){
00263       den = s->rawEnergy();
00264       reader = fReadereb;
00265       readervar = fReaderebvariance;
00266     }else{
00267       readervar = fReaderebvariance;
00268       den = s->rawEnergy();
00269       if(den/cosh(s->eta())<15){
00270         reader = fReadereb_lowPt;
00271       }else{
00272         reader = fReadereb_highPt;
00273       }
00274     }
00275   }  else {
00276     if(!ptSplit){
00277       den = s->rawEnergy() + s->preshowerEnergy();
00278       reader = fReaderee;
00279       readervar = fReadereevariance;
00280     }else{
00281       readervar = fReadereevariance;
00282       den = s->rawEnergy()+ s->preshowerEnergy();
00283       if(den/cosh(s->eta())<15){
00284         reader = fReaderee_lowPt;
00285       }else{
00286         reader = fReaderee_highPt;
00287       }
00288 
00289     }
00290   }
00291   
00292   Double_t ecor = reader->GetResponse(fVals)*den;
00293   Double_t ecorerr = readervar->GetResponse(fVals)*den;
00294 
00295 
00296   //printf("ecor = %5f, ecorerr = %5f\n",ecor,ecorerr);
00297   
00298   return std::pair<double,double>(ecor,ecorerr);
00299 }
